name: Dāi Dāi Dà Màoxiǎn
summary: “Dāi Dāi Dà Màoxiǎn” is a 2D turn-based RPG where players take on the role of Dāi Dāi, a boy born in the Xia dynasty. Along the journey, you will befriend companions, collect the Five Spirit Orbs, and gradually uncover the dark truth behind an evil cult. The game also features a Roguelike mode and challenging dungeon gameplay, offering players a rich and diverse experience.

name: Dāo Qū Qū
summary: Play as your dao-style hero and fight against others! The battle frees your hands, allows you to focus on strategy build. With the card pool building gameplay, random draws gain strategic depth! Skill backpack requires your superb management ability! You have only one goal: to become the Solo King!
